Text: Sorry, that did not go well. I tried to put a link in the description, and poof, no description. ok, if you are looking for this you know what it is, if you happened to find this by just plain browsing, go to themeforest and look it up, i can't post links yes. sorry.

I used themes from themelock.com, and this one is from there. Once you install it, it shows that is where it came from in dashboard of wordpress. Themelock.com themes are full of malware to take over the site. I do not know if they got any clean themes, but last one I used from them like Clockstone 1.2.3 was full of malware. So I am weary of these from them.

@dustyshot
I understand, i have had the same experience with most of those types of sites. but the reality for me is this, i use them for demos on a server that can be sacrificed, when the client agrees to buy, i buy the theme. they are not expensive. i have memberships to theme clubs, but sometimes they do not have what i need for that look&feel.

as always, if you are making money with this, buy it. otherwise, hope for the best, it is the wild internet ;)

ps. i have had no problems with this theme
